title: Forbes Four Huntrend 10/5: Forbes 500, Pau Gasol, Urban Meyer, Rolling Stone, 'Scream', Michigan
itunes:title: Forbes Four Huntrend 10/5: Forbes 500, Pau Gasol, Urban Meyer, Rolling Stone, 'Scream', Michigan
description:
In this edition of Forbes Four Huntrend, Jack and Miles discuss the Forbes 400 list, Pau Gasol retiring from basketball, Urban Meyer getting freaky, Rolling Stones 500 greatest songs, the new 'Scream' film, and Biden's visit to Michigan
